item.description:
Crabb Apple White Water runs the best rafting trips in Northwest Massachusetts on the Deerfield River.  This fall they have openings on the Fife Brook trip for the weekend of October 1 and 2, 2011.  This is the less intense section of the trips for those of you want to try this but were a bit apprehensive.  The foliage and views will be spectacular as you paddle through the Deerfield Valley and the class 3 rapid at Zoar Gap.

 This first weekend I will not be on the trips but I will be there in the afternoon and on Sunday and strongly encourage you try this awesome activity.  It has been keeping me active through tendon recovery.  The company and its guides are first rate.

This the web link to check the company's page regarding this trip.

http://www.crabapplewhitewater.com/massachusetts/deerfield-fife_brook.shtml

If you want to attrend this event, here's what you do.......

Call Crab Apple 1-413-625-2288 in Mass.

You need to mention that you are a member of the hiking Meetup group with Janice May.

Jenn and Frank Mooney have offered our group a price of $75 and this included your wet suit.

Give this a try.  It is an easier section and a good starter trip want to be adventurers! 

 

=== Legal Stuff ===

By clicking on "Count Me In" or "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows: In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Just come up and check in.
